about_the_game:
ShapeVS is a 4 player local mini fast-paced, competition heavy multiplayer game wrapped in a sinister program. Battle it out across a variety of aptitude tests (mini-games) designed by Dr Reginald Pierce of ShapeTECH.

Break the mould and help the minds at ShapeTECH "shape" the newest members of society. Through vigorous testing prove your worth amongst your friends, family members and more and show that YOU deserve your place in the new society.

  • Local Multiplayer Frenzy: Battle it out in various different games that focus on different play styles, controls and rules that you must overcome to win.
  • Eye on the Prize! Only those who have the drive, the power and the hunger to take victory shall be granted entry. Show off how good you are through taunts and other options. Make your opponents know who they’re up against.
  • Power Ups Galore! The power to help or hinder is in your hands, each game comes with a variety of power-ups that change the game.
  • More to Come: We're a small team but we are aiming to expand the world of ShapeVS with new games, customisation options and a single-player experience focused around the world of ShapeTECH and its illustrious leader, Dr Reginald Pierce.

Note: This is currently a local multiplayer only experience!

name: ShapeVS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews:
“I can see ShapeVS becoming a new addition to my ever-growing party game pantheon.”
well-played.com.au
short_description: ShapeTECH welcomes you to participate in their latest aptitude assessment program, ShapeVS. Gather your friends, family members and even colleagues as you participate in a variety of mini-games designed to test your capability of supporting our new society.
